p: While some patients in our cohort clearly had an HEV infection—proven by HEV RNA detection in the blood—13% of our patient cohort had HEV IgM specific antibodies without detection of HEV RNA ( Figure 1). These patients were slightly older than those with undetectable HEV IgM (52 vs. 47 years old, p = 0.008) and were more often immunosuppressed (61.5 vs. 51.8%, p = 0.031, OR = 1.49 (1.04–2.13)). Furthermore, HEV IgG and IgA were more often detectable ( Supplementary Materials Table S2).
